pr_title: Disabling Legacy Filter Dialect in Swagger Documentation

timeline.message: Disabling Legacy Filter Dialect in Swagger Documentation

timeline.bodyText:
Since this is a builder, why is there no
    . supportLegacyDialect(boolean)
timeline.author: wcekan

replies.bodyText: So does this also need to be exposed as an configuration option for elide-spring-boot-starter or change the autoconfiguration to disable the legacy dialect?
replies.author: whgibbo

replies.bodyText: The auto-configuration has the legacy dialect disabled by default.  Also, you can auto-configure the Swagger object construction to turn on/off the dialects you want.
replies.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: I'm new to Elide, but would I be right in thinking that it only supports one dialect..  So for users that want to use the legacy dialect, then the RSQL examples should not be displayed.
timeline.author: whgibbo

replies.bodyText: Elide supports multiple dialects enabled at the same time.
replies.author: aklish
